sentences.en: A permeate collection plenum is in direct fluid communication with each stage.
sentences.cn: 一渗透液收集室与各级直接连通.

sentences.en: After a while it begins to permeate through your skin.
sentences.cn: 过了一会,它会开始渗入你的皮肤.

sentences.en: An obvious change of attitude at the top will permeate through the system.
sentences.cn: 上级态度的明显改变将影响到整个体制。

sentences.en: Eventually, the water will permeate through the surrounding concrete.
sentences.cn: 最终，水会渗透进周围的混凝土中。

sentences.en: Forethemore, we have discussed the permeate combustion model, and the mathematical solution.
sentences.cn: 最后讨论了具有双燃烧前峰的渗透燃烧模型, 并给出了数学解.

sentences.en: Functional relationships permeate every part of science.
sentences.cn: 函数关系渗透自然科学的每个部分.

sentences.en: His subtle satisfaction seemed to permeate the space around them.
sentences.cn: 他难以捉摸的满足感好像弥漫在了他们的周围.

sentences.en: Its mission is to permeate, season , and purify things on earth.
sentences.cn: 他们的使命就是在人间传播,增添健康的活力.

sentences.en: Permeate quality was satisfactory in meeting drinking water standards.
sentences.cn: 然而,滤液水质都可以达到饮用水的标准.

sentences.en: Soil adhesion may be reduced even if water cannot readily permeate the soil layer.
sentences.cn: 即使水不易进入污垢内层,也能降低污垢的吸附作用.

sentences.en: The permeate gas is then compressed and condensed for further recovery.
sentences.cn: 渗透气经压缩、冷凝进一步回收,达到了减少排放的效果.

sentences.en: The smell of diesel oil permeated the air.
sentences.cn: 空气里充斥着柴油的气味。

sentences.en: Thought the political work principle: All - directions melt to go in to permeate.
sentences.cn: 思想政治工作理念: 全方位 融入渗透.

sentences.en: Water will easily permeate a cotton dress.
sentences.cn: 水很容易渗透棉布衣服.

sentences.en: You see, Holiness is to permeate all read of life.
sentences.cn: 你看 、 圣洁是要渗透我们生命的每一角落.

words.tran_cn: 渗透性；透磁率，导磁系数；弥漫
渗透；[化学] 渗透作用；散布性

trans.tran_en: if liquid, gas etc permeates something, it enters it and spreads through every part of it
